snippet: Fugitive charges were dropped against a 60-year-old woman who escaped from a Michigan prison in 1977 after authorities discovered she had surrendered decades ago and already been sentenced to time served....

headline.print_headline: California Woman, No Longer a Fugitive, Set Free
headline.main: California Woman, No Longer a Fugitive, Set Free

lead_paragraph: Fugitive charges were dropped against a 60-year-old woman who escaped from a Michigan prison in 1977 after authorities discovered she had surrendered decades ago and already been sentenced to time served.
